title: Topic 001 Question 230
body: You want to share Terraform state with your team, store it securely, and provide state locking.
How would you do this? (Choose three.)
options: Using the remote Terraform backend with Terraform Cloud / Terraform Enterprise.
Using the s3 terraform backend. The dynamodb_field option is not needed.
Using an s3 terraform backend with an appropriate IAM policy and dynamodb_field option configured.
